property.name: recordId
property.label: Record Id
property.description: Associates the page record ID with the component. Use {!recordId} for dynamic binding.

property.name: supportedFileExtensions
property.label: Supported File Extensions
property.description: Comma-separated list of allowed extensions (e.g., PDF,DOC,DOCX,JPG,PNG). Leave blank for all types.

property.name: maximumSizeMb
property.label: Maximum File Size (MB)
property.description: Maximum file size in megabytes. Leave blank for no limit.

property.name: allowMultipleFiles
property.label: Allow Multiple Files?
property.description: Set to true to allow multiple files upload at once; false for single files only.

property.name: maxFileCount
property.label: Maximum Number of Files
property.description: Maximum number of files allowed for upload. Leave blank for no limit.
